      • splash

        public static JStartingWindow splash(java.awt.Image splashImage,
                     java.lang.String msg)
        Constructs and displays a SplashWindow.

        This method is useful for startup splashs. Dispose the returned frame to get rid of the splash window.

        Parameters:
        splashImage - The image to be displayed.
        Returns:
        Returns the frame that owns the SplashWindow.
